title: Posant en membre des comice d'Agriculture de son département. (Les Bons Bourgeois, No. 1), from Charivari
marks: Signature LLC in the print, in black: [h.D.]
description: man with a shovel, leaning against a short wall outdoors, with a small potted plant behind his PL elbow; watering can next to wall at man\'s feet; photographer at left behind his black cloth
creditline: Gift of Janet H. Spokes in memory of her parents, Angelica and Ignatius Houley
